title: The Cigar Authority Meets Nikolia Volkoff
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority Meets Nikolia Volkoff
description: The guys sit down with and interview Nikolia Volkoff.  In the second hour The European Cigar Journal's US Editor and Chief Colin Gauley calls in to talk about his cigar rating system.  This weeks cigars are The Hammer and Sickle and the Davidoff Anniversario No. 2.
